name: CoinGrid - 3D Platformer
shortDescription: Jump, run, and explore vibrant 3D worlds in this exciting platformer! Collect Gold Coins and Gems, unlock unique heroes, and climb the global Leaderboard.
fullDescription:
Experience the thrill of 3D Platformer â€” a fast-paced running and jumping adventure across colorful and challenging environments. Leap across moving and separated platforms like icy floes, wooden logs, and more, while avoiding hazards and racing against time.

Key Features:

  • Exciting Gameplay: Jump, dash, and sprint across dynamic platforms in unique worlds such as Ice Land and Deep Wood.
  • Collectibles & Rewards: Gather Gold Coins and Gems to unlock heroes, power-ups, and other rewards.
  • Unlockable Heroes: Play as adorable characters like Chief (Penguin), Doki (Duck), or Dumbo (Sheep), each with unique abilities to boost your performance.
  • Global Leaderboard: Compete with players worldwide and show off your skills and Gem score.
  • In-Game Shop: Spend Gems in the Shop to buy Gold Coins and upgrade your heroes for better performance.

Perfect for players of all ages, 3D Platformer combines fun, strategy, and fast-paced action in a visually stunning 3D adventure.
